column5: Absolutely lovely mid-century modern designed apartment with private entrance and backyard with a fire pit in the heart of Irving, Texas. Our prime location is conveniently located less than 10 miles from airports, and less than 15 miles from AT&T stadium & Six Flags. Located near major highways with public transportation a block from your door you are free to explore all of the exciting offerings of the DFW metroplex or simply relax in by the fire. Additional cleaning fee for long term stay.
